articles.headline: Which NBA teams have never won a championship?
articles.description: Some NBA teams have scored multiple titles, but which franchises have never won? Check out this list for more championship context.

articles.headline: Who has won the NBA Finals? Championship winners by year
articles.description: In 2025, the Oklahoma City Thunder secured their first NBA title. Check out other champions dating back to 1950.

articles.headline: NBA Finals history: Top player and team records and stats
articles.description: The Lakers have more NBA Finals appearances than any other team, with 32. Check out other top championship records and stats now.

articles.headline: NBA offseason 2025: Draft, free agency, trade targets for 30 teams
articles.description: NBA front office insider Bobby Marks breaks down the summer priorities and needs for every team.

articles.headline: Tyrese Haliburton's injury prompts reactions from LeBron, Mahomes
articles.description: LeBron James led reactions from around the sports world as others sent their best wishes for Haliburton.
